Author: katebishophawkguy
Text: it might help to just schedule it out and have select items that don’t make you as nauseous you eat every day or you could try getting your calories through liquids like smoothies and adding a nut butter, protein powder, and oatmeal to them. as you eat more, you may get less nauseous. also eating plain stuff tends to help like oatmeal.  if you’re getting nauseous regularly, it could be a symptom of an underlying issue like anxiety, hormone issue (taking birth control made me nauseous all the time), a food intolerance, etc.
